City Manager
============

It is the City’s goal to provide you with timely and effective communication concerning activities, information, and issues that affect Orange citizens. We hope you will communicate your thoughts and ideas on ways we can better serve you through this site. You may also
[email the Orange City Manager, Mike Kunst](mailto:mkunst@orangetexasgov.us)
.

[**City Manager Severance Agreement**](https://orangetexas.gov/DocumentCenter/View/3328/City-Manager-Severance-Agreement)
